readable.title: 2369452202_8b0e8e25ca
readable.content: A crowd of people is standing around a red , white and blue hot air balloon as it is readied to launch into the blue sky . A crowd of people watch as a Remax hot air balloon gets ready to take off . A hot air balloon just off the ground surrounded by people . A red hot air balloon lands in a field among a crowd . people next to a red , white and blue hot air balloon that is on the grass
